title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8156.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8156.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Route 19. Route
19 between the Genesee-Wyoming county line and Route 78 in the Towns of

Covington, Middlebury, Warsaw and Gainesville, and the Villages of Wyoming and

Warsaw. (b) CR 2 between Route 19
and Route 19A in the Town of Gainesville and Village of Silver

Springs. (c) Route 39 from the

Erie-Wyoming county line to a point 2.0+- miles west of the Erie- Wyoming
county line in the Town and Village of Arcade. (d) Route 77. Route 77 between the

Genesee-Wyoming county line and Route 98 in the Towns of Bennington, Sheldon
and Java. (e) [Eff. until Feb. 28, 1996, see also subd. (e) below.] Route 98. Route 98 between Route 77 and a
point 0.5+- mile north of the Wyoming-Cattaragus county line (RM 98-4602-1005)
in the Towns of Java, Arcade and the Village of Arcade. (e) [Eff. Feb. 28, 1996 until Sept. 24, 1997, see also subd. (e) above and below.] Route 98. Route 98 between Route 77 and
the Wyoming-Cattaragus county line in the Towns of Java, Arcade and the Village
of Arcade. (e) [Eff. Sept. 24, 1997, see also subd. (e) above.] Route 98. Route 98 between the Genesee-Wyoming
county line and the Wyoming-Cattaraugus county line in the Towns of Attica, Sheldon, Orangeville, Java and Arcade, and the Villages of Attica and

Arcade. (g) Route 246. Route 246
between the Wyoming-Genesee county line and Route 39, in the Towns of

Covington, Perry and the Village of Perry. (h) Route 39. Route 39 between Route 98 and
the Wyoming-Livingston county line, in the Towns of Arcade, Eagle, Pike, Genesee Falls, Castile, Perry and in the Villages of Arcade, Pike, Castile and

Perry. (i) Simmons Road. Simmons

Road (CR 25) between US Route 20A and Route 39, in the Town of Perry and the

Village of Perry. (j) Route 78. Route 78 between the Wyoming-Erie county line and Route 19 in the Towns of

Sheldon, Java, Wetherfield and Gainesville. (k) US Route 20A. US Route 20A between the

Erie-Wyoming county line and Route 19 in the Towns of Sheldon, Orangeville, Warsaw and the Village of Warsaw. (l) US Route 20A between Route 19 and Route
246 eastbound only in the Towns of Warsaw and Perry, and in the Village of

Warsaw. (m) Route 238. Route 238
between the Genesee-Wyoming county line and US Route 20A in the Towns of Attica
and Orangeville, and the Village of Attica. (n) Route 354. Route 354 between the

Erie-Wyoming county line and Route 98 in the Towns of Bennington and Attica, and in the Village of Attica. (o) CR 2. CR 2 between Route 19A and Route 39 in the Town of Castile and the

Village of Silver Springs. (p) Route 436 (a/k/a CR 38 and Denton Corners Road). Route 436 (a/k/a CR 38 and

Denton Corners Road) between Route 39 and Route 19A in the Towns of Pike and

Genesee Falls. (q) Route 19A. Route
19A between Route 39 and the southerly junction of Route 436 in the Towns of

Castile and Genesee Falls. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8156.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
